oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Newspaper clipping, 'U-Boat Tried to Sink Balfour's Ship'
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Newspaper clipping from the January 9, 1918 edition of The Chattanooga News. The article is titled 'U-Boat Tried to Sink Balfour's Ship.' It details a failed German U-Boat attempt to destroy a ship carrying Arthur J. Balfour, former British Secretary for Foreign Affairs, on September 14, 1918. The article concludes by explaining how an American military vessel sank the German submarine.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Robert Frank Hodge World War I Papers, 1914-1919
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: American Field Service; World War, 1914-1918
Clippings; Newspapers
